website_summaries.verdict: This new Dell XPS 13 is the first great laptop of 2015, but it owes that title more to a smart design revamp than Intel's new processors.
pros: Dell's revamped XPS 13 has a nearly borderless display and a very small body for a 13-inch laptop, plus the latest Intel CPUs
cons: a touchscreen isn't included by default
the boost from the new CPU is minimal

customer_reviews.title: Computer is awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Computer is awesome...when it works. The computer wouldn't boot after only two months out of the box. Sent it to Dell customer support, who fixed the issue, and then sent it back to me. 2-3 weeks later I'm having the same issue again, won't boot. Now I have to call Dell customer support again and probably wait another two weeks to have the issue supposedly resolved. Probably will never purchase any Dell product ever again
customer_reviews.author: kindle_user

customer_reviews.title: this is pretty distressing.
customer_reviews.text: The day it arrived, the computer would not turn on. The battery light and the power indicator were on. The acreen remained black. The computer became very hot, very quickly. This is disappointing, as this computer was a present for a student going off to college next week. By the time the return process is finalized it will be a week at least. At this price, this is pretty distressing.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked to give it five stars
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked to give it five stars, if it wasn't for the inability to have wireless connection. I have wireless Bose ear phones and speakers, all of which work flawless on my Macbook Pro and on another windows machine I own. With this device I have spend many hours and tried to get it to work. I researched this issue and there is a lot to be found on supposed fixes. Nothing worked. Besides this serious issue, this machine is well made has substance and feels like a brick in my hands. Too bad, but this device is replaced again with my Macbook.
customer_reviews.author: EAH

customer_reviews.title: I had the coil whining issue and had to return ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the coil whining issue and had to return it. Dell initially told me that there would be a BIOS update until Jan, 2017 however, they did not update any.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop in 2017. Worked great for about 3 months. Then nothing but problems. Weird screen blanks, zagged lines, VERY slow boot up. The topper was it would lose the internet connection. Gave up and bought 2018 Acer Aspire 3 15.6" FHD Laptop Computer, AMD A9-9420. So far so good. Dell makes great desktops but their laptops are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far this laptop is great. My second XPS, this time with touch and higher resolution. It is exactly what I expected and just as high quality as my earlier model....and much much lighter. The only drawback I have found after having it for about a week is the keyboard layout. There is a smaller return key and an even smaller oddly placed shift key on the left side. I have hit the wrong key just about every time due to this placement and size. Hoping I will get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnsii

customer_reviews.title: Not always compatible with windows updates
customer_reviews.text: After the major firmware update in 2018, it fried my system (constant blue screen, doesn't recognize hard drive on rebuild). I wish I could recommend this product. I've had two in the past 6 years. It's lightweight, looks great. As an IT professional, I cannot recommend this product. The customer service is not great and quality control needs a lot of work as you will read from other reviews. You can find another great lightweight laptop that actually functions for longer than two years.
customer_reviews.author: sari

customer_reviews.title: Less than a year and the computer is off warranty and the LCD is broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought the computer in march 2017. The warranty ran out in November 2017 and I have a LCD error light and no ability to turn my computer on. This is my primary business tool and now I'm going to have to purchase another computer to use while this gets fixed. Thanks Amazon and thanks Dell.
customer_reviews.author: James Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this! Go to Dell or Newegg.com to buy!
customer_reviews.text: It came with a bogus MS Office 2016 product key. I had to chat with Microsoft to get a good product key. The laptop registration was bogus too. I registered with my name, etc but the confirmation email I got had someone else's name!!! Very suspicious! I decided to return it for a full refund. Dont' buy this laptop!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Antec300

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Dell laptops
customer_reviews.text: The Laptop is just a reason to make my whole day busy. From the day I bought it, it never worked properly. After multiple complaints to dell I never received any satisfactory solution. Dell's support is hopeless. 1. To Shutdown the laptop you have to manually press the button... whenever you shutdown it from menu, it will restart. 2. It never sleeps even after setting it up for after 5 min. 3. Even after you do it sleep manually, it will consume all the battery 4. Till now I have received blue screen error 2 times.
customer_reviews.author: priyank kansal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to travel with!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this laptop. Very thin and easy to travel with. I almost forget it is there when walking through the airport. My only complaint is an occasional black screen that makes me do a forced restart. That may be a deal breaker for some people, but the size and light weight makes me forgive the flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: It gets me
customer_reviews.text: the laptop is very great as an ultrabook, body is slim, screen is beautiful, and specs are really good(i have i7 256g version). build quality isn't that good as Macbook, but still considered one of the best ultrabooks ive ever seen in my life. Here are the drawbacks: occasionally, i did find some issues using the touchpad to scroll up and down. HEAT dissipation is bad, it can raise to a warm point(35-40degrees?) just watching YouTube videos. Overall, its a perfect laptop that suits my need for school/travel, I would give 5 if touchpad issues are solved.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Warranty time frame.
customer_reviews.text: The computer has been great in all areas. My only concern was the retailer has had the computer for almost 1 1/2 years and I had to work with Dell on the one year warranty. As purchased my warranty was to expire 1 month are my purchase. Dell says third party's get like 1 1/2 years of warranty, so when you buy an item you may already be out of warranty. Dell extend my warranty or I was going to return the item. I did have warranty work done, as the laptop would not charge consistently. This has been corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Stuck on Dell logo when rebooting
customer_reviews.text: Pretty terrible: gets stuck on Dell logo on reboot while on battery power. Boots and reboots okay on AC. I'd like to exchange it to just give it another try, but this seller (shows as AI Electronics) only offers a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of problems with this notebook. It is a shoddy product. Keyboard pieces fall very easily. Memory died and needed to be replaced after just over a year. Charger connection got loose and stopped charging. Had to be replaced. Battery went dead soon after warrantee was out. I would not buy Dell anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Hadi S. Esfahani

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 1 yr 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Speed, portability, and physical design. Cons: Today the laptop turned off, it never turned back on. Blinking error LEDs indicate CPU failure. When I first purchased the display would not turn back on after being in sleep mode. BIOS updates finally fixed the issue. Notes: I take care of my equipment. I have always had the laptop in a protective sleeve and I carry it in a very nice laptop backpack. 98% of this laptops life lived on a desk. Should be no reason it failed. A laptop this expensive should last.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Build quality is excellent. I've mainly purchases ASUS Zenbooks in the past
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is excellent. I've mainly purchases ASUS Zenbooks in the past, and I feel this laptop will physically last longer. Out of the current Skylake based laptops, this one has the best display resolution (for a small/lightweight form factor) and has great Linux support compared to ASUS. The addition of the Samsung based M.2 storage is a bonus since they currently offer the best performance.
customer_reviews.author: G.E.

customer_reviews.title: The computer has a bad hard drive
customer_reviews.text: The computer has a bad hard drive. Called dell, this computer is 2 years old so its past warranty so who ever sold this to me is a crook and they scammed me, dont buy from this crook
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Roth

customer_reviews.title: I love my Dell until my screen freezes and a gray ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my Dell until my screen freezes and a gray block appears on the top of the screen. At first I just thought it was a one time thing but its done it a couple of times. Need to close it and open again. You cant even right click to refresh your screen!
customer_reviews.author: Janell Arce

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful screen with great color contrast and depth, and no light bleed whatsoever. It honestly looks like a 4k screen! I personally cannot buy laptops that have glossy screens so I am glad this seller offers the harder and harder to find i5 non-touch. Packaging and everything was great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mercer Comander

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget to update
customer_reviews.text: Out of box there are some minor issues. WIFI was acting funny. After installing the latest drivers from the Dell support website and upgrading to the latest version of Win 10, everything works perfectly. The Win 10 upgrade process was buggy though, I tried three times before I finally completed it. Overall it is a very good computer. The minor issues out-of-box most likely should be blamed on Microsoft.
customer_reviews.author: rfimor

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I was completely duped
customer_reviews.text: Received a refurbished model instead of a new one (which was ordered). That Dell Outlet packing was awful, it was a half crushed box with laptop being held by a think plastic wrapped against a cardboard. No manuals or paperwork etc. Plus it didn't work as it kept on displaying BIOS error that its unable to identify laptop charger and laptop will not be charged. I felt like I was completely duped, and I am pretty sure I will have to pay for sending this product back.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Windows 10 Microsoft Signature Image) Silver It's a great laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the - Dell XPS9350-8008SLV 13.3" 3200x1800 Laptop (Intel Core i7-6560U 2.2GHz Processor, 16 GB RAM, 512 GB SDD, Windows 10 Microsoft Signature Image) Silver It's a great laptop.... EXCEPT for the screen flashing uncontrollably a few months in. I've tried any\all fixes i could fine online, but nothing actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Inert

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment from Dell
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Bought this machine and a Dell USB-C to HDMI adapter. The laptop will only connect to an external monitor for a minute or two, then flicker off. It will eventually stop connecting to the external monitor at all. Updated all the drivers, per Dell support site. Spent two hours on the phone with Dell Support who couldn't make it work. They eventually concluded this was a product defect. Really disappointed that such an expensive machine won't work with an external monitor out-of-the-box. And the screen on this machine is smaller than on a 13-in Mackbook Air. Returning for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Best 13" Windows-Based Ultrabook today
customer_reviews.text: Terrific laptop. Good: -Size -Display is stunning -Construction/Build Quality Bad: -Trackpad is not as good as Apple, but totally acceptable. -Camera placement Used this ultra book for a little over a week now and it is as good as advertised. The improvements over the first generation of this design have truly made the best Windows-based ultra book on the market today. The issues that I have noted above are pretty minor (for me) and acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: BladeRunner

customer_reviews.title: great laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Awwww man so far thus laptop us coming on to be a great purchase! The specs are well off, I have the i7 16 gig model, though I recommend you stick to the i5 version as there is no differences unless you are looking for 16 gig as only the i7 seven has that option. Its small and light for me, the screen outperformed my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Carlo Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Rerceived new computer with damaged battery and expired warranty
customer_reviews.text: I received a computer with a damaged battery and am now stuck with it. I bought the pc in November 2017, but couldn't return it or use the warranty since it has expired in May 2016. The diagnosis I had made on the battery showed that it has to be replaced. It seems like it is an refurbished one even I bought a new laptop. I would rather recommend you paying much attention to the health of the products you receive and an up-to-date warranty. Just saying...
customer_reviews.author: Bine A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop overall, I have been using it for a month now and its sturdy, sleek, and in my opinion sexy. Performance is great like my PC. It needs an update to windows 10 when you get it but that was the only thing which was a bother.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Hemenway

customer_reviews.title: It's a great buy...love it, so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far...I LOVE IT! Fast, Great Size, Comfortable to the Touch...and much more! Using it with Photoshop to proof and edit my professional photos... it has been performing just as well as the powerful desktop. Considered a Surface Pro 4 or Book...glad I stayed with the XPS. Everybody has their likes and dislikes when it comes to their personal computer...for me this is JUST RIGHT!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, but i had a problem with store app
customer_reviews.text: Amazing computer! Super sexy design, and crazy speed. The only reason I didn't give it five was that I got it in an open box deal and for some reason the store app wouldn't open it. It took several days and many hours with escalated Microsoft engineers to finally get it fixed, which made me really mad. But the computer is so awesome I still can't not give it 4 stars. Probably want to buy it unopened though! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure that you read the fine print on accessories
customer_reviews.text: Received the laptop without a charger which was disappointing but the seller shipped it eventually. Make sure that you read the fine print on accessories. The laptop works great. Got it for a cheaper price since it was held in inventory for almost an year since production. Bought 3 year warranty and accidental damage care for the money that I saved on the deal. Update BIOS if you lose battery in sleep mode. You get 7-8 hours of charge on an average which is decent enough. Lightweight, ease to carry almost anywhere you go. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Arshad Hashmi

customer_reviews.title: The labtop has problems after a bit more than one ...
customer_reviews.text: The labtop has problems after a bit more than one months. We are trying to contact the company but have not received any response. Contacted Dell but Dell says that it is an old PC and out of warranty period (although we purchased it as a new PC). Do not know what to do....
customer_reviews.author: Mapple tree

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. I really like it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I really like it. It is not heavy allowing me to take it to anywhere. And I have to say that its screen does excellent job so that the color of the photo seems more vivid. But there is only one issue about this product is users should update some software by themselves for its video card, BIOS and so on.
customer_reviews.author: miao

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, look for other options
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even get to try the PC, it wouldn't boot windows no matter what method I tried, I explored the BIOS searching for any change that might prove useful to no avail. We also found with local DELL that the warranty was expired by the time we bought it. We returned it and got reimbursed, at least that part was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Worst Experience ever
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the laptop from Amazon in 2017 and Amazon purchased the laptop from Dell in 2015. When i look up in Dell's website, it says that the warranty is expired as it was first purchsed in 2015. It was new laptop I got from Amazon . Its having so many issues and we have no one to help.
customer_reviews.author: Atul Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Lots of problems!
customer_reviews.text: I get the "HD screen has stopped working and recovered" message very frequently. The computer also tends to turn on and get hot at night when in "sleep mode". Goes into airplane mode on its own. Too late to return it but I'm very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Anirad

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop with a brilliant form factor design maximizing screen ...
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop with a brilliant form factor design maximizing screen surface area resulting in a light and compact device with a deceptively large screen. Very fast and has a great display. - Balaji
customer_reviews.author: Balaji Rathakrishnan

customer_reviews.title: The laptop is well built and it look awesome! But there is a constant electric buzzing noise ...
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is well built and it look awesome! But there is a constant electric buzzing noise that comes from under the keyboard. I already updated the video and audio firmware, which made the noise change to a lower pitch, but it is still there... Honestly some people might not be bothered, as the noise resembles that of a old tower pc, but for me it is a distracting noise that disrupts my work.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Rock Solid. It's more than 5 years.
customer_reviews.text: Rock Solid. It's more than 5 years. Still running best without any breakdown despite daily use.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sam

customer_reviews.title: I keep praying everyday.
customer_reviews.text: Works great when it is working. My laptop hard disk melted within a month of purchase. Dell service team was very good with their follow-up. Appears to be working now. Keeping fingers crossed and praying everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Kathiresa Alagappan

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE -- Garbage That Dell Can't Fix
customer_reviews.text: This machine has been nothing but trouble, and Dell has not stepped up to the plate to support it. Hard drive died after 3 months, and then the machine would only work when plugged in (it no longer recognized the battery). After getting jerked around by customer service reps that neither understood the product nor spoke English well enough to have a meaningful discussion, they replaced the motherboard. Then just a few weeks later, the machine dies again. Meanwhile, Dell customer service is completely unhelpful. What a mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sinderbrand

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY- MAYBE BUY FROM MICROSOFT BUT NOT HERE
customer_reviews.text: I have three issues with my computer that Dell will not help me fix. In less than 2 years, I get less than 2-3 hours of battery life. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kara J

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Machine but terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Good performance, battery life not as good as advertised but still decent. Biggest mystery is my they incorporate Win10 touch features on a device whose screen can't be folded flat or wrapped around? Kind of annoying because you badly want to use touch capability but it's ergonomically clumsy to do so. Update... What a POS. Battery failed after 6 months now charger failed. Machine reboots on a whim. Screen doesnt fold 180 degrees only 150 degrees. Avoid this unit.
customer_reviews.author: mark l

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic!
customer_reviews.text: Started out loving it, but just after a year the mouse pad and the key board both stopped working properly and of course it was out of warranty. Pathetic !
customer_reviews.author: J. E. K.

customer_reviews.title: Numerous VRAM failure leading to BSDs from the time of ...
customer_reviews.text: Numerous VRAM failure leading to BSDs from the time of opening the box. Eventually leading to the laptop bricking after a year for BIOS failure. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrtwinkles

customer_reviews.title: Hoping it would have better quality. Amazon is very nice to issue a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend. After 3 months the laptop suddenly can not boot up. Hoping it would have better quality. Amazon is very nice to issue a return after such a long time. As for Dell, 3 months is really a short life cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Had to do some tweaking of the resolution to make the wife happy. Haven't used it much since I don't want to loss an arm.
customer_reviews.author: Tim F. Drevyanko

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke right out of the gate, battery not charging. Took them 6 weeks to fix the laptop
customer_reviews.author: Pak Song

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Laptop. I bought the touchscreen version...the only concern about this product is a wifi card issue where the card stops working after the laptop is closed. It's easy to get back functionality by disabling and re enabling. Hopefully the drivers would be updated soon...
customer_reviews.author: Smiles :D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic laptop. Very portable and also has a lot of great features and good hardware.
customer_reviews.author: TChilton

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I didnt buy the XPS 15
customer_reviews.text: spectacular. I'm glad I didnt buy the XPS 15 . I can run Linux out of the box (fedora 24) and I can play games like Bioshock Infinite with great quality. If you buy this version of the laptop (with the 6560), then try getting the Dell Power Companion battery. Most people dont realize that this laptop can be charged by an external battery.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep Srinivasa

customer_reviews.title: Worst laptop in the world
customer_reviews.text: Worst laptop in the world. 700 dollars down the drain because the screen just turns black. I babied this laptop with the most care and never even left it on the table to eat or drink while using it. Literally the laptops fault.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Computer! Highly recommended for business or personal use! Nothing bad to say about this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: ... computer almost 3 weeks ago and it has performed great. The issue I have with the computer is ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the computer almost 3 weeks ago and it has performed great. The issue I have with the computer is that the earphone jack did not switch the audio from the internal speaker to the headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Yanick
customer_reviews.text: Got it 1 month ago. Great laptop, super fast and quick. Battery good all round. Great design. Satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Andy paats

customer_reviews.title: Excellent computer. Super lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Excellent computer. Super lightweight, which I need since I had back surgery and can't carry heavy objects. Very fast and comfortable keys. I wish it came with Microsoft Office for the price it is, but I do like it regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen G.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it...
customer_reviews.text: The size of the computer is amazing and the looks as well, everyone I met fell in love with the design and the screen is just awesome. Why I don't like it? well the drivers sucks, I got to use the touch screen only a few time, now it works when it want to... you need to be updating hardware drivers constantly from Dell and still they don't fix the touch screen issue with Win10. I also had problems with the video output, bluetooth drivers and USB C drivers. Won't buy it again... Dell support SUCKS!! I would go for Lenovo or back to Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop but Screen still flickers even after updating video drivers (dell recommended) it was returned
customer_reviews.author: Frak

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Everything went great with Amazon! Very happy so far and still purchasing more goods! Hope they keep it the same way! Regarding Dell xps, very satisfied as well! High quality screen, much better than Mac.
customer_reviews.author: federico

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop I've ever owned! A friend who is a diehard Mac user is impressed that it's equally as good as the Macs. For a whole lot less money! I highly recommend this laptop. The screen is beyond clear and the speed is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Expensive, Poor Quality Piece Of Junk
customer_reviews.text: My Dell XPS 13 is the most unreliable, quirky, piece of junk laptop I have ever owned. The motherboard, SSD, and screen have all been replaced already and it's not even 6 months old. It's in repair as much as I am able to use it. That is ridiculous, especially for the price! The laptop has been in a hard shell case since I've bought it and is rarely used; only when I travel outside of my office. So extremely disappointed with the problems, performance, and overall experience with this laptop. Gets great reviews from many sites from an initial, limited usage perspective. It has been SO unreliable, slow, and problematic. Definitely would NOT recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Maranatha

customer_reviews.title: Overheats easily.
customer_reviews.text: It's fast but is prone to overheating. Was forced to send to Dell for repairs after a year and some.
customer_reviews.author: Raq

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine.
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb laptop. Everything runs snappy on my i5 machine, including day to day web browsing to mid-size MATLAB projects. I am very pleased with this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Ming-Yuan Yu

customer_reviews.title: Meets all expectations
customer_reviews.text: The computer came as described, has great display and a smooth sleek interface. I'd recommend to most people who consider buying Mac, this is cheaper and better I'm telling you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Audio Driver Problems
customer_reviews.text: Great product BUT Still has problems with drivers (in my case audio drivers) sometimes i loose audio until i reboot the pc
customer_reviews.author: EdVer

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT AND THIN
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the wife and she loves it. Light and thin
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great Ultraportable
customer_reviews.text: got the laptop today and I'm extremely happy with it the display is absolutely stunning and the battery life appears to hold up to ~9-10 hours the best laptop I've ever owned hands down
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light and function very well! Got a used one with half the original price and it surprised me as it seems brandly new!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Wang

customer_reviews.title: Battery not charging past 68%, Dell support no help
customer_reviews.text: Received this 3 weeks ago, first week was fine and then the battery would not charge past 68%, tried: 1) hard reboot 2) complete drain of battery 3) tried another charger 4) BIOS updated to most recent of website dated June 2016 5) called and troubleshooted with dell, they couldnt figure it out. They wanted me to send for repair, I said NO, so am returning to AMAZON. Others are having problems with this on the forum. You would think dell knows about this but not. Thank god I got it from Amazon and have no problem returning it within the 30 day window. If this happened after 30 days that would suck....
customer_reviews.author: Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: beautiful screen, good keyboard layout
customer_reviews.text: Really fast, beautiful screen, good keyboard layout, works like a dream, its an amazing laptop, and it is a pleasure to look at
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lunzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Fast however with an issue
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Laptop. Small and fast. The only thing I have an issue with is that the “@“ key has been switched with “ (double inverted comma) key on the keyboard. I don’t expect such an issue for the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Faiz Dhurue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good buy if you're looking for a sleek, lightweight portable laptop. Quick and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: John Bohlen

customer_reviews.title: the screen is awesome (got the UHD version)
customer_reviews.text: Its light, the screen is awesome (got the UHD version), but with MS Windows, there may be sometimes when older programs that don't adhere to the modern APIs have their texts garbled or are extremely tiny due to the high res. I gripe that like all newer portable machines, contaminated by Apple's philosophy, the upgradability of this is limited. So you are forced to decide on the memory at purchase time. The saving grace is the HDD is probably upgradeable/replaceable. Beware though that Dell marketers can be a dubious bunch. They will try to sell you add on warranty... that you can haggle for.
customer_reviews.author: Durianwool

customer_reviews.title: Screen flickers then goes dark at random times. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I'd be wary of this laptop. For a few months now, I've experienced issues with the screen flickering and then just going dark at random times. Restarting the machine will make the screen work again, but the pattern just repeats. Disappointed to be experiencing this problem when I paid so much for this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: This unit has a continuous screen flicker that just won't ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit has a continuous screen flicker that just won't go away. I've updated the BIOS, the video driver, wifi driver as well as made sure that all available Win 10 updates have been added. I thought I had it fixed at one point only to have it start up again the next day. Have done numerous web research to see if anyone has found a solution and there aren't any out there. Am currently trying to get Dell to take it back. Too much money for a worthless piece of trash that can't be used. Not the vendor's fault but a faulty piece of equipment by Dell.
customer_reviews.author: CEich

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LAPTOP
customer_reviews.text: Its a great laptop. No slow downs or anything. Takes everything you throw at it. And it looks sexy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: One of the best ultrabook
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite laptop. However, I had to ask for exchange because the first one had a broken touchpad and trackpad. The wifi card is ok but can be better.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful laptop in a small package! It's super fast, the graphics are great, and the speakers are good. The battery life is very solid. The laptop has heated up a few times though, and the trackpad can be finicky at times. Overall, a great laptop
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: after um week with this compuer blue screen error and network hardware stop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very annoying flaws
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design, robust. However... it's a Dell. It as a few hardware/software flaws that cannot be tolerated for this kind of high-end ultrabook. Most annoying flaws are issues with sleep (keeps waking up and draining battery) and Wi-Fi (needs to turn on and off to discover some high-signal networks). Both issues seem common to XPS 13, it is not just me being unlucky. Even though many friends suggested I stay away from Dell I decided to switch from Toshiba and try this XPS 13. Will go back to Toshiba next time.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Has an annoying coil whine and its screen started flickering and got ...
customer_reviews.text: Has an annoying coil whine and its screen started flickering and got broken after it fell on the bed. on the BED!
customer_reviews.author: M. reyes

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: so far so good - no more windows 10 problems, on my old Dell the memory was always getting full - rebooting all of the time. Now much more memory and no crashing
customer_reviews.author: Teri M.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well. It was having some problems coming ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. It was having some problems coming out of sleep until all the updates were installed; since then it seems to be OK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new computer and received a used and broken computer... I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rosangela Ferraz

customer_reviews.title: Laptop dead
customer_reviews.text: Received laptop, was working, plugged in overnight for trip next morning- now laptop won't turn on
customer_reviews.author: Michael Galvin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a great hardware and an elegant design... Dell did it..
customer_reviews.author: Naga Appani

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Monitor has broken twice since purchasing. Now unusable. Dell completely unhelpful.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic J. Sirianni

customer_reviews.title: One of the best ultrabooks out there
customer_reviews.text: Dell XPS13 is not a perfect one and was not especially when launched but it is one the best ultrabooks out there. Dell fixed a lot of issues with battery drainage, SSD, etc... They even fixed the buzzing sound issue that was heared while scrolling in late driver updates. It seemed to be caused by some driver. Overall the laptop is great, thermals are good, battery life good. For anyone looking for good ultrabook, XPS 13 (particularly newer one, with upgraded hardware) is a something to consider strongly.
customer_reviews.author: Ivane Narimanidze

customer_reviews.title: Stupid little inconveniences...
customer_reviews.text: Fresh out of the box and the wireless driver is hoarked.... What a lovely QA you all must have... Now to find the return shipping label...
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find anything to complain about!
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best. All the awards say so, and they're right. A fn key lock light would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: robert graham

customer_reviews.title: Be forewarned. Software application technology has not yet caught up with display technology.
customer_reviews.text: Several of my programs could not take advantage of the HD display and rendered in very tiny text. I tried the several work-arounds suggested on the net, including altering the registry, without success. Ultimately ended up returning the otherwise excellent machine and ordering the non-touch, 1920 x 1080 display - all other configurations the same. Unfortunately, this configuration is not listed on Amazon for the 9350 models, so I had to order it directly from Dell.
customer_reviews.author: Kippy

customer_reviews.title: Battery crashed in a month. Six months later the computer crashed wont even turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this notebook last year. It worked fine for a month and then the battery just died. Now it won't work without the power plugged to the wall. Do effectively the notebook has turned from portable to a desktop. Very disappointed with Dell. Six months later the battery died and wont even charge with the wire any longer. Since I bought it from US store and imported it to Saudi I can't return it nor take it to a service center here as it is registered in US only. For past six months communicating with DELL service to have my product registration changed to Saudi Arabia but they cant fix it. Feel disgusted. what a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Buntoo

customer_reviews.title: Battery kinda iffish but a very good laptop. Incredibly light and portable
customer_reviews.text: It was okay. As expected. Battery kinda iffish but a very good laptop. Incredibly light and portable. Will edit in 6 months after using properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit for Purpose and Received on time and in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, present for my wife, she loves the form factor and the fact that it fits into her handbag.
customer_reviews.author: OldManChild

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great computer - fast, small, light, touch screen, beautiful display. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Epic fail
customer_reviews.text: Best part of this experience was the ease of return. Worst part was that the laptop had no operating system and did not work out of the box. Spent a few hours on the phone with Dell Tech Support and tried repeatedly to get the operating system, Windows 10, to download from the dell site onto a flash drive, as instructed by the 2 Tech representatives, but this was an epic fail - just like the laptop. It's too bad too, because the laptop was beautiful and just what we had wanted...
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: If Dell service had of handled it better, I would not give it such a low ...
customer_reviews.text: Laptop may have been okay, but it quit after 1 month. If Dell service had of handled it better, I would not give it such a low rating. After 1 month in repair, an exchange was arranged. I was shipped a refurbished replacement. Needless to say, I am not happy with Dell and can't get a person on the phone who is fluent in English or can comprehend well enough to address my issue. Their response is a return must be made within 30 days. I loved Dell until now.
customer_reviews.author: lacey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, fast stylish and fast. Not the best value for money though
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Zoheb Zubbeer

customer_reviews.title: Dell XPS 13 is a great device
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, beautiful and functional design. Only issue is camera placement at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, lightweight but robust built. Like Apple quality. Superb screen. The best PC right now in market.
customer_reviews.author: Manoranjan Sahoo

product_meta.title: Dell XPS9350-5340SLV 13.3 Inch QHD+ Touchscreen Laptop (6th Generation Intel Core i7, 8 GB RAM, 256 GB SSD) Microsoft Signature Edition
product_meta.description: CPU:Intel Core| Capacity:8 GB RAM / 256 GB SSD| Style:Laptop OnlyErasing borders, starting with the display. The smallest 13-inch laptop on the planet has the world’s first virtually borderless InfinityEdge display — amazing both inside and out.
feature_bullets: Intel Dual Core i7-6500U 2.5 GHz Processor. 8 GB LPDDR3. 256 GB SSD Storage; Optical Drive Not included
13.3 Inch QHD+ (3200 x 1800 pixels) LED-lit Truelife Touchscreen. Windows 10 Operating System; Machined Aluminum Chassis.
Two recommendations are to update the BIOS (that’s pretty standard), but also there is a Firmware update for the Thunderbolt dock.
Dell XPS 13 9350 System BIOS: SupportAssist PreBoot 2.0 support; Improve Intel(R) Iris(TM) Graphics 540 stability.

Intel Thunderbolt 3 Firmware Update: Fixed the issue that the peer-to-peer connection may lost after resuming from sleep/hibernation; Improved the stability with Dell platforms with Thunderbolt support.
